sentences.en: A badly sunburned face or back is extremely painful.
sentences.cn: 严重的脸部或背部晒伤会非常疼痛。

sentences.en: a painful blow on the head
sentences.cn: 头部遭到的疼痛一击

sentences.en: For years he tended her in her painful illness.
sentences.cn: 多年来她一直受到病痛的折磨，都是他在照料。

sentences.en: He found the transition to boarding school excruciatingly painful.
sentences.cn: 他发现转到寄宿学校极其痛苦。

sentences.en: He was finding it painful to breathe.
sentences.cn: 他发现呼吸的时候很痛苦。

sentences.en: Her sunburn made intimacy too painful.
sentences.cn: 她的皮肤晒伤了，使得想要亲热一下都变得很痛苦。

sentences.en: I shut out the memory which was too painful to dwell on.
sentences.cn: 我不再去回忆那些痛苦不堪的往事了。

sentences.en: Is your arm very painful?
sentences.cn: 你的手臂很疼吗？

sentences.en: It is a painful experience having the boil lanced.
sentences.cn: 把疖子切开是很痛的。

sentences.en: It was nowhere near as painful as David had expected.
sentences.cn: 这远不如戴维所料想的那么痛苦。

sentences.en: It's a play — painful, funny and powerfully acted.
sentences.cn: 这是一部悲喜交加、表演感人的戏剧。

sentences.en: Painful memories were dragged up for Tina during the filming.
sentences.cn: 在拍摄过程中蒂娜又被勾起了那些痛苦回忆。

sentences.en: stiff painful joints
sentences.cn: 僵硬疼痛的关节

sentences.en: Teething can be painful and make your baby irritable.
sentences.cn: 长牙会很难受，婴儿会烦躁不安。

sentences.en: The King's stand is bound to reawaken the painful debate about abortion.
sentences.cn: 国王的立场必然会再次引发关于堕胎的令人头痛的辩论。

sentences.en: The neck becomes swollen and painful to the touch (= hurts when you touch it ) .
sentences.cn: 脖子肿起来了，一碰就疼。

sentences.en: The readjustment to peace and home is slow and painful.
sentences.cn: 重新适应和平以及家庭生活是缓慢而痛苦的。

sentences.en: The shutdown is the latest in a series of painful budget measures.
sentences.cn: 此次关闭是一系列艰难预算措施中最新实施的一项。

sentences.en: The symptoms include skin rashes, fever, and painful joints.
sentences.cn: 病症包括皮疹、发烧和关节疼痛。

sentences.en: The women deve-loped painful RSI because of poor working conditions.
sentences.cn: 由于工作条件恶劣，这些妇女患上了痛苦的重复性劳损症。

words.tran_cn: 痛苦的；疼痛的；令人不快的

trans.tran_cn: 令人疼痛的，令人痛苦的，不愉快的
trans.tran_en: if a part of your body is painful, it hurts
